message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get a unique and valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1100000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm still confident that my product is worth more. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1150000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1050000 for the product.
I understand you're trying to save some money, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $1125000.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1075000 for the product.

I'm starting to get concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1125000, which is my best and final offer.
